question: Which country is the focus country at the 39th India International Trade Fair (IITF)?
explanation: The 39th edition of India International Trade Fair (IITF-2019) has started at Pragati Maidan in New Delhi with theme \'Ease of Doing Business\'. In the 14-day Trade Fair, the status of \'Partner Country\' has been accorded to Afghanistan and South Korea is the Focus Country. Bihar and Jharkhand are the focus states.
